description: Deletes a user account by their email address, requiring explicit confirmation.

parameters.description: The unique email address of the user account to be deleted.
parameters.name: userEmail

parameters.description: A boolean flag that must be set to 'true' to confirm the irreversible deletion of the user account.
parameters.name: confirm

querySuggestion: DELETE FROM UserAccounts WHERE email = '{userEmail}' AND {confirm} = TRUE;
